entry.title: Trackless Links Pro
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 19.99 â†’ USDÂ 2.99 [USDÂ 0.99 ~ USDÂ 19.99]ï¼‰

å…¨éƒ¨ä»·æ ¼ä¿¡æ¯

ä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 2.99

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors. UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat. WHAT IT DOES â€¢ Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around â€¢ Custom redirects (e.g. reddit â†’ old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns â€¢ Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them â€¢ Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services â€¢ Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more WHY IT'S USEFUL Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services. TRACKING BLOCKER Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices. URL REDIRECTS Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported. SEARCH ARCHIVE One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device. iCLOUD SYNC Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, tweaks, and statistics sync automatically. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere. BROWSER TWEAKS Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere. KEY FEATURES â€¢ Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac â€¢ Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection) â€¢ Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity â€¢ Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically â€¢ Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps â€¢ Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules â€¢ Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users â€¢ Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering â€¢ Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity â€¢ Works offline - no internet connection required DESIGN PRINCIPLES Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms. IMPORTANT NOTES Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental. SUPPORT & FEEDBACK Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues PRIVACY No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device. EULA Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE? Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

-- From the makers of the award-winning Just Press Record! -- Calling all music, dance and fitness enthusiastsâ€¦ and absolutely anyone who wants to change the tempo of their favourite songs without affecting pitch or fidelity! Perfect Tempo is the only app youâ€™ll ever need to speed up or slow down over 100 million songs on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app. Create unlimited playlists and, if you have an Apple Watch, control playback from your wrist for the ultimate convenience! Perfect!! PICK ANY SONG â€¢ Change the tempo of any song on Apple Music, in your Music app or Files app without affecting pitch or fidelity â€¢ Access the entire Apple Music catalog of over 100 million songs! â€¢ Play tracks from Cloud Drive, Dropbox and other cloud services â€¢ Quick access to your recently played songs ADJUST THE TEMPO â€¢ A simple slider for adjusting tempo â€¢ Select any tempo from -50% to +100%, in 1% increments â€¢ Easily revert to the original tempo with just one tap â€¢ App will remember your chosen tempo until you want to adjust it again CREATE SETLISTS â€¢ Create unlimited Setlists â€¢ Name your Setlists to find them easily later â€¢ Continuous play from one song to the next â€¢ Set and remember different tempos for different songs â€¢ Combine songs from Apple Music, your Music app and Files app all in the same Setlist â€¢ Create Setlists from existing albums and playlists in your Music app or on Apple Music REPEAT JUST ONE SECTION â€¢ Select and change the tempo of just one section of a song and then loop it to make practise easy â€¢ Add sections of a song to a Setlist multiple times and then play them back at different tempos APPLE WATCH â€¢ Easily control playback, tempo and volume from your wrist AIRPLAY â€¢ AirPlay support for output to wireless speakers or Apple TV AND MORE â€¢ Support for Dark Mode â€¢ Change the key (transpose up or down) of locally stored DRM-free songs imported into the app or from your Music app. (Missing the pitch controls from the last version? Re-enable them in the Settings app > Perfect Tempo. Then swipe left on the album artwork when playing a song) IMPORTANT! * Songs from streaming services other than Apple Music are not supported *

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼šUSDÂ 2.99 â†’ USDÂ 0.89 [USDÂ 0.39 ~ USDÂ 2.99]ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether youâ€™re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more! Key Features: Baseball Action Like Never Before: Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batterâ€™s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun! Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay: Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops! Collectible Doodle Characters: Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments. Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun: Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action! Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound: Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run. Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure. Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!
